author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Matthew Miller has been the Fedora Project Leader for over 10 years now and he feels like it's time for a change, not because he's sick of the position but because the project needs new energy and new ideas

title: Fedora Linux Turns Over A New Leaf
